name: Orbsling
description:
In Orbsling, you are inherently defenseless, so, in order to survive the hordes of colorful squares enemies, you must take advantage of your ability to knock back and attract the provided ball, as well as being able to slow down time.

Special thanks to @KissaKolme for the inspiration and @Hux52 for helping out!

Controls:

  • Move with the arrow keys
  • Hold X to slow down time
  • Press and release X to hit nearby balls away
  • Hold C to attract balls towards you

FAQ:

The game isn't very good - Sorry

It's just a bunch of squares - I know

Is Ryan Gosling in it? - No, unfortunately
